snippet: President Mohamed Morsi’s appearance with his top general came amid reports that soldiers had tortured protesters  during the 18-day uprising in 2011.
abstract: Egypt's Pres Mohamed Morsi appears with Gen Abdel-Fattah el-Sissi, who denies reports that soldiers may have detained, tortured and killed civilian protesters during 18-day uprising that ousted former Pres Hosni Mubarak; joint appearance is meant to dispel speculation about possible tensions between military elite and Morsi, Egypt’s first fairly elected, and non-military, president, and longtime leader of Muslim Brotherhood.
lead_paragraph: President Mohamed Morsi’s appearance with his top general came amid reports that soldiers had tortured protesters  during the 18-day uprising in 2011.

headline.seo: Morsi Shows Support for Egypt’s Military
headline.main: Morsi Shows Support for Egypt’s Military
headline.print_headline: Morsi Shows Support for Egypt’s Military
